summary: REQ-3 is partially implemented: the PractitionerAuthority headshot now points to a new static path, but the actual uploaded/cropped image asset is not added under frontend/public in this diff, so the frontend cannot serve the new photo as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the new user-uploaded headshot image in the repository under frontend/public (served as a static asset) and update the PractitionerAuthority headshot to reference that asset (new image file: “WhatsApp Image 2026-02-05 at 9.44.49 AM.jpeg” cropped/optimized to “facilitator-headshot.user-upload.dim_400x400.jpg”).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff updates the to “/assets/generated/facilitator-headshot.user-upload.dim_400x400.jpg”, but there are no added files in the diff (Added: 0) and no evidence that the JPG exists under frontend/public. The requirement explicitly requires the new image be included in-repo under frontend/public.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/documentation updates not requested as part of swapping the facilitator headshot (updates to frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to replacing the headshot image asset and its reference; it does not request updating repo summary/metadata files.
